stem: Какое утверждение о кислородно-топливного hose/torch threads — верно?

choices.text: Fuel gas fittings use right-hand threads
Fuel gas fittings use left-hand threads with notches

rationales.CHOICE-2: Fuel gas fittings — left-hand (often with notches); кислород — right-hand to предотвращает mixups.
